attributes.additional_details: I think the ukranian priminister and all of his army and people deservere this clap every day at 7pm to show our love and support for all of them.
attributes.background: I think the ukranian priminister has gone above and beyond in this unprovoked fight for freedom.goverment and parliment should do what they did for the nhs and clap every evening at 7pm to show our support.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to publicly support Ukraine are a matter for each individual, not the UK Government or Parliament.
